    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Caracol pitagórico animado</string>
            <string language="en">The animated Pythagorean snail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die lebhafte pythagoräische Schnecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'escargot pythagorien animé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O caracol pythagorean animated</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lumaca pythagorean animata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ζωντανεψοντα πυθαγορικό σαλιγκάρι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación que muestra una secuencia de triángulos rectángulos cuyas hipotenusas son las raíces cuadradas de los primeros naturales</string>
            <string language="en">simulation which shows the sequence of right triangles with hypotenuses equal to the square roots of the first natural numbers</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Pitágoras</string>
            <string language="en">Pythagoras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo rectángulo</string>
            <string language="en">right triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">hipotenusa</string>
            <string language="en">hypotenuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">irracionales</string>
            <string language="en">irrational numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation, die die Reihenfolge der rechten 
Dreiecke mit den Hypothenusen zeigt, die den Quadratwurzeln der ersten
natürlichen Zahlen gleich sind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation qui montre l'ordre de bonnes triangles
avec des hypoténuses égales aux racines carrées des premiers nombres
normaux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação que mostra a seqüência de 
triângulos direitos com os hypotenuses iguais às raizes quadradas 
dos primeiros números naturais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione che mostra la sequenza di giusti 
triangoli con i hypotenuses uguali alle radici quadrate dei primi 
numeri naturali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσομοίωση που εμφανίζει την ακολουθία σωστών 
τριγώνων με τα hypotenuses ίσα με τις τετραγωνικές ρίζες των 
πρώτων φυσικών αριθμών</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pythagoras</string>
          </keyword>
